reference.title: Context search support
reference.shortdesc: Context search enables you to search for character strings within main dialog boxes and Device Navigator. You can also look for sub-folders and devices within folders in Device Navigator.

section.p: You can use context search in the following:

ul.li:
Function windows
History window
Device List window
Inspection Memo window
Parts window
Inspection Schedule window
Document Link window
Parameter List window
PLUG-IN Applications window
Calibration Data window
Dialog boxes

User Management
Service Code List
Reference Code List
Register Parts code
Document List
PLUG-IN Application List
Class List
Device Icon List
Assignment of Device Icons
Approve Inspection Memo
Approve Inspection Schedule
Approve Calibration Data

section.p: Context search cannot be used for dialog boxes activated within main dialog boxes.
